thread.title: BRIEF-Sinopec Oilfield Service Corp's Unit Enters Finance Leasing Agreement With Taiping & Sinopec Financial Leasing

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sinopec Oilfield Service Corp's Unit Enters Finance Leasing Agreement With Taiping & Sinopec Financial Leasing

organizations.name: finance leasing agreement with taiping & sinopec financial leasing

text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Sinopec Oilfield Service Corp :
* UNIT ENTERS FINANCE LEASING AGREEMENT WITH TSFL, TO SELL LEASING ASSETS AT A CONSIDERATION OF RMB1 BILLION
* TSFL TO LEASE BACK LEASING ASSETS WITH LEASING PRINCIPAL OF RMB1 BILLION TO UNIT & LEASING INTEREST IS ABOUT RMB174.2 MILLION
* FIXED INTEREST RATE OF 4 PCT PER ANNUM UNDER FINANCE LEASING AGREEMENTâ€‹ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
